sourcesContent:
import {useState , useEffect} from "react"; import Axios from "axios"; export default function SetEmlploi (){ const [groupeList , setGroupeList] = useState([]) const [monday1List , setMonday1List] = useState([{nom:"",prenom:""}]) const [monday2List , setMonday2List] = useState([{nom:"",prenom:""}]) const [monday3List , setMonday3List] = useState([{nom:"",prenom:""}]) const [monday4List , setMonday4List] = useState([{nom:"",prenom:""}]) const [ groupeChoisis , setGroupeChoisis ] = useState("") useEffect(()=>{ Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/select/groupe").then((response)=> { setGroupeList(response.data) }) }) useEffect(()=>{ Axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/select/cours/monday/1/${groupeChoisis}`).then((response)=> { setMonday1List(response.data) }) Axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/select/cours/monday/2/${groupeChoisis}`).then((response)=> { setMonday2List(response.data) }) Axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/select/cours/monday/3/${groupeChoisis}`).then((response)=> { setMonday3List(response.data) }) Axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/select/cours/monday/4/${groupeChoisis}`).then((response)=> { setMonday4List(response.data) }) }) return(
08:30 10:50 11:10 13:15 13:30 15:50 16:10 18:30
Lundi

{monday1List[0].nom} {monday1List[0].prenom}

{monday1List[0].codeSalle}
{monday1List[0].codeModule}

{monday2List[0].nom} {monday2List[0].prenom}

{monday2List[0].codeSalle}
{monday2List[0].codeModule}
Mardi
Mercredi
Jeudi
Vendredi
Samedi
) }
